author: Staff Reporter
text:
Cash of Rs. 4 lakh was allegedly stolen from a locked grocery shop in Tiruchendur. The shopkeeper was shocked at the incident after he noticed the rear door of the shop broke open at 9 a.m. on Wednesday, sources said.

According to J. Ramesh (35) of Santhana Mariamman Kovil Street, Tiruchendur, the shop was locked at 11.30 p.m. on Tuesday. Tiruchendur temple police filed a case.
title: Cash stolen
